sentences.en: A tornado leveled the entire business district.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风使整个商业区成为平地。

sentences.en: A tornado levelled the entire business district.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风使整个商业区成为平地.

sentences.en: A tornado whirled into the town last week.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风上周袭击了这座城市.

sentences.en: A tornado whirled into town.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风刮进了城里.

sentences.en: Centuries ago, this deserted place was a flourishing town, but a tornado is said to have wiped it out.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪前, 这片荒芜的地方曾是一座繁荣的小镇, 可据说一场龙卷风扫平了它.

sentences.en: It was the beginning of a tornado.
sentences.cn: 这是龙卷风的雏形.

sentences.en: Meteorologist believe this pressure jump is the mechanism responsible for storm and tornado.
sentences.cn: 气象学家认为这一气压的突然升高是暴风雨和飓风形成的物理机制.

sentences.en: Python: how to return from generator function using tornado?
sentences.cn: 如何从生成器函数返回使用龙卷风?。

sentences.en: The approaching tornado struck awe in our hearts.
sentences.cn: 正在逼近的龙卷风使我们惊恐万分.

sentences.en: The phenomenon is believed to be down to a mini tornado which touched down elsewhere, sucking apples from the ground or from trees.
sentences.cn: 据信这一现象可能是由于附近某处的果园有小型的龙卷风出现，把苹果从地上或树上揪下来了。

sentences.en: The ruin of the house was caused by a violent tornado.
sentences.cn: 一阵猛烈的旋风把房屋卷倒了.

sentences.en: The surface pressure at the centre of the tornado is shown in Figure 7.26.
sentences.cn: 陆龙卷中心的地面气压如图7.26所示.

sentences.en: The tornado claimed dozens of lives.
sentences.cn: 那场龙卷风夺去了几十条人命.

sentences.en: The tornado cut a swath through the town.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风袭击该镇,留下破坏的痕迹.

sentences.en: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.en: The tornado is coming, so we had better batten down the hatches here and get to the cellar.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风即将来临，因此我们最好把这里的舱口封上，到地下室去。

sentences.en: The Tornado jet fighter - bomber has two air intakes.
sentences.cn: 旋风式喷气轰炸机有两个空气入口.

sentences.en: The tornado laid the houses flat.
sentences.cn: 旋风夷平了那些房子.

sentences.en: The tornado rubbished the whole village.
sentences.cn: 龙卷风毁掉了整个村庄。

sentences.en: They took shelter from a tornado at a crypt.
sentences.cn: 他们在地下室躲避龙卷风。

sentences.en: This part of the community really shows you the randomness and intensity of the tornado.
sentences.cn: 这部分的社区真的向你展示了龙卷风的随机性和强度。

trans.tran_cn: [大气]龙卷风，陆龙卷，大雷雨，具有巨大破坏性的人（或事物）
trans.tran_en: an extremely violent storm consisting of air that spins very quickly and causes a lot of damage
